comment: Obsolete proof of ~ sbequ as of 7-Jul-2023. An equality theorem for substitution. Used in proof of Theorem 9.7 in [Megill] p. 449 (p. 16 of the preprint). (Contributed by NM, 14-May-1993.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
